getTotalTimeInForeground().Description: Get the total time this package spent in the foreground, measured in milliseconds.

getLastTimeVisible().Description: Get the last time this package's activity is visible in the UI, measured in milliseconds since the epoch.

Parameters: UsageStats: The @B_android#app#usage#UsageStats_E@ object to merge into this one.
Throws: if the package names of the two @B_android#app#usage#UsageStats_E@ objects are different.
add(android.app.usage.UsageStats).Description: Add the statistics from the right @B_android#app#usage#UsageStats_E@ to the left. The package name for both @B_android#app#usage#UsageStats_E@ objects must be the same.

getLastTimeStamp().Description: Get the end of the time range this @B_android#app#usage#UsageStats_E@ represents, measured in milliseconds since the epoch. See @B_java#lang#System#currentTimeMillis_E@.

Returns: a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance. Value is either 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@
describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

getLastTimeForegroundServiceUsed().Description: Get the last time this package's foreground service was used, measured in milliseconds since the epoch. See @B_java#lang#System#currentTimeMillis_E@.

Parameters: Parcel: The Parcel in which the object should be written.
int: Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).Description: Flatten this object in to a Parcel.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

getFirstTimeStamp().Description: Get the beginning of the time range this @B_android#app#usage#UsageStats_E@ represents, measured in milliseconds since the epoch. See @B_java#lang#System#currentTimeMillis_E@.

getTotalTimeForegroundServiceUsed().Description: Get the total time this package's foreground services are started, measured in milliseconds.

Parameters: Parcel: The Parcel in which the object should be written.

int: Additional flags about how the object should be written. May be 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@. Value is either 0 or a combination of @B_android#os#Parcelable#PARCELABLE_WRITE_RETURN_VALUE_E@, and android.os.Parcelable.PARCELABLE_ELIDE_DUPLICATES
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel,int).Description: Flatten this object in to a Parcel.
writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel,int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

getLastTimeUsed().Description: Get the last time this package's activity was used, measured in milliseconds since the epoch. See @B_java#lang#System#currentTimeMillis_E@.

getTotalTimeVisible().Description: Get the total time this package's activity is visible in the UI, measured in milliseconds.

ClassDesc: Contains usage statistics for an app package for a specific time range.
